00019 #include "cswordbiblemoduleinfo.h"
00020 #include "cswordversekey.h"

00025 //Sword includes
00026 #include <versekey.h>

00028 static VerseKey staticKey;
00029 
00030 CSwordBibleModuleInfo::CSwordBibleModuleInfo( SWModule* module )
00031     : CSwordModuleInfo(module) {
00032     m_bookList = 0;
00033     m_cachedLocale = "unknown";
00034     m_hasOT = m_hasNT = -1;
00035 }
00036 
00037 CSwordBibleModuleInfo::CSwordBibleModuleInfo( const CSwordBibleModuleInfo& m ) : CSwordModuleInfo(m) {
00038     if (m.m_bookList) {
00039         m_bookList = new QStringList();
00040         *m_bookList = *m.m_bookList;
00041     }   
00042     m_hasOT = m.m_hasOT;
00043     m_hasNT = m.m_hasNT;
00044     m_cachedLocale = m.m_cachedLocale;  
00045 }
00046 
00047 CSwordModuleInfo* CSwordBibleModuleInfo::clone(){
00048     return new CSwordBibleModuleInfo(*this);
00049 }
00050 
00051 CSwordBibleModuleInfo::~CSwordBibleModuleInfo(){
00052     delete m_bookList;
00053 }
00054 
00056 QStringList* CSwordBibleModuleInfo::books() {
00057     if (m_cachedLocale != backend()->booknameLanguage()){   //if the locale has changed
00058         delete m_bookList;
00059         m_bookList = 0;
00060     }
00061     
00062     if (!m_bookList) {
00063         m_bookList = new QStringList(); 
00064         if (m_hasOT == -1)
00065             m_hasOT = hasTestament(OldTestament);
00066         if (m_hasNT == -1)
00067             m_hasNT = hasTestament(NewTestament);
00068             
00069         int min = 0;                
00070         int max = 1;
00071         //find out if we have ot and nt, only ot or only nt
00072         if (m_hasOT && m_hasNT) {
00073             min = 0;
00074             max = 1;
00075         }
00076         else if (m_hasOT && !m_hasNT) {
00077             min = 0;
00078             max = 0;
00079         }
00080         else if (!m_hasOT && m_hasNT) {
00081             min = 1;
00082             max = 1;
00083         }
00084 
00085         staticKey.setLocale(LocaleMgr::systemLocaleMgr.getDefaultLocaleName());
00086         for (int i = min; i <= max; ++i) {
00087             for ( int j = 0; j < staticKey.BMAX[i]; ++j) {
00088                 m_bookList->append( QString::fromLocal8Bit(staticKey.books[i][j].name) );
00089             }
00090         }
00091         m_cachedLocale = backend()->booknameLanguage();     
00092     }
00093     return m_bookList;
00094 }
00095 
00097 const unsigned int CSwordBibleModuleInfo::chapterCount(const unsigned int book) const {
00098     int result = 0;
00099     if ( (book >= 1) && book <= (unsigned int)staticKey.BMAX[0]) {      //Is the book in the old testament?
00100         result = (staticKey.books[0][book-1].chapmax);
00101     }
00102     else if ((book >= 1) && (book - staticKey.BMAX[0]) <= (unsigned int)staticKey.BMAX[1] ) {   //is the book in the new testament?
00103         result = (staticKey.books[1][book-1-staticKey.BMAX[0]].chapmax);
00104     }
00105     return result;
00106 }
00107 
00109 const unsigned int CSwordBibleModuleInfo::verseCount( const unsigned int book, const unsigned int chapter ) const {
00110     unsigned int result = 0;
00111     if (book>=1 && (book <= (unsigned int)staticKey.BMAX[0]) ) { //Is the book in the old testament?
00112         if (chapter <= chapterCount(book) ) //does the chapter exist?
00113             result = (staticKey.books[0][book-1].versemax[chapter-1]);
00114     }
00115     else if (book>=1 && (book - staticKey.BMAX[0]) <= (unsigned int)staticKey.BMAX[1]) {    //is the book in the new testament?
00116         if (chapter <= chapterCount(book) ) //does the chapter exist?
00117             result = staticKey.books[1][book-1-staticKey.BMAX[0]].versemax[chapter-1];
00118     }
00119     return result;
00120 }
00121 
00122 const unsigned int CSwordBibleModuleInfo::bookNumber(const QString &book){
00123     unsigned int bookNumber = 0;
00124     bool found = false;
00125     staticKey.setLocale(LocaleMgr::systemLocaleMgr.getDefaultLocaleName());
00126     int min = 0;
00127     int max = 1;    
00128     //find out if we have ot and nt, only ot or only nt
00129     if ((m_hasOT>0 && m_hasNT>0) || (m_hasOT == m_hasNT == -1)) {
00130         min = 0;
00131         max = 1;
00132     }
00133     else if (m_hasOT>0 && !m_hasNT) {
00134         min = 0;
00135         max = 0;
00136     }
00137     else if (!m_hasOT && m_hasNT>0) {
00138         min = 1;
00139         max = 1;
00140     }
00141     
00142     for (int i = min; i <= max && !found; ++i) {
00143         for ( int j = 0; j < staticKey.BMAX[i] && !found; ++j) {
00144             ++bookNumber;
00145 //#warning Use Unicode???
00146             if (book == QString::fromLocal8Bit( staticKey.books[i][j].name) )
00147                 found = true;
00148         }
00149     }       
00150     return bookNumber;
00151 }
00152 
00154 const bool CSwordBibleModuleInfo::hasTestament( CSwordBibleModuleInfo::Testament type ){
00155     if (m_hasOT == -1 || m_hasNT == -1) {
00156         CSwordVerseKey key(this);
00157         key.key("Genesis 1:1");
00158         key.next(CSwordVerseKey::UseVerse);
00159         qWarning("test key's now %s", key.key().latin1());
00160         if (key.Testament() >= 2 && !module()->Error()) { //2 == NT
00161             qWarning("has no old testament");
00162             m_hasOT = 0;
00163             m_hasNT = 1;
00164         }
00165         else {
00166             qWarning("has old testament");      
00167             m_hasOT = 1;
00168             m_hasNT = 1;
00169         }
00170     }
00171 
00172     switch (type) {
00173         case OldTestament:
00174             return m_hasOT>0;
00175         case NewTestament:
00176             return m_hasNT>0;       
00177         default:
00178             return false;
00179     }
00180 }
